meanings.definition: The act of organizing into departments.
meanings.sent1: In our company, departmentalization helps us stay organized and efficient.
meanings.sent2: The departmentalization of the company has led to better communication between teams.
meanings.sent3: I tried to departmentalize my toys, but they kept getting mixed up!
meanings.sent4: Her departmentalization of the project made everything run smoothly like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The departmentalization of the school made it easier for students to find the right resources.

meanings.definition: The process of dividing into specialized units.
meanings.sent1: Departmentalization allows each unit to focus on specific tasks.
meanings.sent2: The departmentalization of the project made it easier to track progress.
meanings.sent3: The departmentalization of the cookies by flavor made the taste test more fun!
meanings.sent4: The departmentalization of the team turned them into a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The departmentalization of the garden into sections made it easier to maintain.

meanings.definition: The practice of grouping tasks or activities into separate departments.
meanings.sent1: Effective departmentalization ensures each department has a clear focus.
meanings.sent2: The departmentalization of responsibilities helped streamline the workflow.
meanings.sent3: The departmentalization of chores at home turned into a competition!
meanings.sent4: The departmentalization of the event planning made everything fall into place perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The departmentalization of the kitchen made cooking more efficient.
